TopicTitle: Nullius in verba - Science without the paperwork

Articles.Content:
![1F1xGbs.png](http://i.imgur.com/1F1xGbs.png)

"We can lick gravity, but sometimes the paperwork is overwhelming." - Werner Von Braun

This mod is a save file (to be put with your other save games). It unlocks all components so that you can explore the Kerbin system unhindered. The idea is to use science points as a scorekeeping device. Since the points do not have to be spent, you can track your progress solely from the perspective of exploration. 

Essentially this is a standard science game, I have a custom difficulty setting. Science returns are 100%. 

I'll likely be updating and changing this as I get feedback.

"Nullius in verba" - Motto of the Royal Society 

(Take no one's word for it)

[Nullius in Verba - On Curse](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/230989-nullius-in-verba-pure-exploration-no-paperwork)
